function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misleading information and panic buying of unproven medicines and protective equipment.","Impact":"Increase in unnecessary hoarding and consumption of unproven products, leading to shortages and potential harm.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate information about the effectiveness of medicines and protective equipment.
